verbose_text: A proposed mechanism of suppressing the inflammation by omega-3 PUFAs is reduction of TNF-alpha gene transcription by inactivating the NF-kB signaling cascade secondary to decreased IkB phosphorylation at serine 32 [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: TNF-alpha gene transcription by inactivating the NF-kB signaling cascade secondary to decreased IkB phosphorylation at serine
